Project Deliverable

Project Roadmap

A project is usually consisted of 5 stages: planning, researching, executing, testing, and publishing. We devide up our big projects into different sections (or stages) to micro-manage and monitor the project progression and performance. By doing so, we can easily spot at which point an issue has occur, or which stage has been performing lower than average. It is also up to you to segment your own project according to your own needs.
